metadata.title: DialogTab | Conversational Commerce on WhatsApp
metadata.description: DialogTab is a conversational commerce platform that automates receiving your order or guidance to your user a product via WhatsApp.
metadata.keywords: WhatsApp Business API, conversational commerce, e-commerce, chatbot, multi-agent, WhatsApp sales

industryContent.description: DialogTab unites WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and Live Chat in one inbox, saving your team hours of repetitive work and ensures no conversation is ever lost

Turn WhatsApp into your most powerful e-commerce sales channel. Automate abandoned cart recovery, manage orders in real time, and deliver personalized product recommendations — all from a unified omnichannel inbox integrated with Shopify, WooCommerce, and more

Streamline travel reservations, send instant booking confirmations, and handle inquiries 24/7. Automate itinerary updates, check-in reminders, and multilingual traveler support across WhatsApp, Instagram, and all messaging channels

From reservation to checkout, deliver five-star guest communication at scale. Automate booking confirmations, room service requests, and real-time concierge support via WhatsApp and every messaging platform your guests prefer

Accelerate test drive bookings, service appointments, and vehicle inquiries through messaging. Automate lead follow-ups, send service reminders, and provide instant vehicle specs and pricing via WhatsApp and all your customer channels

hero.partnerBadge: Official WhatsApp Business Partner trusted by businesses worldwide

meta.title: WhatsApp for E-Commerce & Retail | DialogTab
meta.description: Boost your e-commerce sales with WhatsApp Business API. Automate abandoned cart recovery, order management, product recommendations and customer support — all from one omnichannel inbox.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp e-commerce, WhatsApp Business API retail, abandoned cart recovery WhatsApp, WhatsApp order management, Shopify WhatsApp, WooCommerce WhatsApp, e-commerce chatbot

hero.title: Turn WhatsApp into your #1
hero.description: Recover abandoned carts, manage orders, and send personalized product recommendations — all through WhatsApp. DialogTab integrates with Shopify, WooCommerce, and IKAS to create a seamless shopping experience.

whyDialogTab.title: Why DialogTab for E-Commerce?
whyDialogTab.subtitle: DialogTab is purpose-built for online retail businesses that want to turn WhatsApp into a high-converting sales channel with seamless storefront integration.

points.title: Native Shopify & WooCommerce Sync
points.description: Connect your store in minutes and sync products, inventory, and orders in real-time. No manual data entry, no CSV uploads — everything flows automatically between your e-commerce platform and WhatsApp.

points.title: 35% Abandoned Cart Recovery
points.description: Automatically trigger personalized WhatsApp messages when customers leave items in their cart. Include product images, prices, and one-click checkout links that convert at 3x the rate of email.

points.title: AI-Powered Product Discovery
points.description: Customers can search your catalog, get personalized recommendations, and even identify products by sending photos — all within the WhatsApp conversation. Turn every chat into a shopping experience.

points.title: End-to-End Order Management
points.description: From browsing to payment to delivery tracking, manage the entire customer journey without leaving WhatsApp. Reduce support tickets and increase repeat purchase rates.

features.title: Abandoned Cart Recovery
features.description: Automatically send WhatsApp reminders to customers who left items in their cart. Recover up to 35% of lost revenue with personalized messages and direct checkout links.

features.title: Order Management via WhatsApp
features.description: Create, track, and update orders directly in WhatsApp conversations. Send automated order confirmations, shipping updates, and delivery notifications.

features.title: Product Catalog & Search
features.description: Share product cards, search inventory in real-time, and identify products from customer-sent images. Your entire catalog accessible through chat.

features.title: Multi-Agent Sales Team
features.description: Multiple sales agents can handle conversations simultaneously from one WhatsApp number. Auto-assign leads based on availability, skill, or product category.

features.title: Shopify & WooCommerce Integration
features.description: Sync your product catalog, inventory, and orders in real-time. Manage everything from a single dashboard without switching between platforms.

features.title: AI-Powered Customer Support
features.description: Let AI handle up to 80% of repetitive questions — order status, return policies, product info. Your team focuses on high-value conversations.

howItWorks.title: How DialogTab Works for E-Commerce
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your online store connected to WhatsApp in minutes and start selling through conversations.

steps.title: Connect Your Store
steps.description: Integrate your Shopify, WooCommerce, or IKAS store with DialogTab in just a few clicks. Your product catalog, inventory, and customer data sync automatically.

steps.title: Configure Automations
steps.description: Set up abandoned cart recovery messages, order confirmation flows, shipping notifications, and AI-powered product recommendations tailored to your store.

steps.title: Automate Sales & Support
steps.description: Let AI handle product inquiries, order status checks, and return requests. Automatically route high-value conversations to your best sales agents.

steps.title: Scale Your Revenue
steps.description: Launch broadcast campaigns, segment customers by purchase behavior, and continuously optimize your WhatsApp commerce funnel with real-time analytics.

items.title: Cart Recovery Automation
items.description: Send timely WhatsApp reminders with product images and one-click checkout links to recover abandoned carts.

items.title: Post-Purchase Updates
items.description: Automatically notify customers about order confirmation, shipping status, and delivery updates via WhatsApp.

items.title: Product Recommendations
items.description: Use AI to analyze purchase history and send personalized product suggestions that drive repeat sales.

items.title: VIP Customer Engagement
items.description: Create segmented campaigns for loyal customers with early access to sales, exclusive offers, and personalized outreach.

items.question: Does DialogTab integrate with Shopify and WooCommerce?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab offers native integrations with Shopify, WooCommerce, IKAS, Ticimax, and other major e-commerce platforms. Your product catalog, inventory, orders, and customer data sync in real-time — no manual imports needed.

items.question: How does abandoned cart recovery work on WhatsApp?
items.answer: When a customer abandons their cart, DialogTab automatically sends a personalized WhatsApp message with the product images, prices, and a one-click checkout link. You can customize the timing, message content, and follow-up sequences. Most stores see a 25-35% recovery rate.

items.question: Can customers browse and buy products directly in WhatsApp?
items.answer: Absolutely. DialogTab lets you share interactive product cards, enable catalog search within chat, and even allow customers to identify products by sending photos. They can add items to cart and complete checkout without leaving WhatsApp.

items.question: How many agents can use DialogTab on one WhatsApp number?
items.answer: There is no limit. DialogTab supports unlimited agents on a single WhatsApp Business number. Conversations are auto-assigned based on availability, skill, or product category, and agents can collaborate with internal notes and transfers.

items.question: What analytics does DialogTab provide for e-commerce?
items.answer: DialogTab provides comprehensive e-commerce analytics including cart recovery rates, conversion metrics, revenue per conversation, agent performance, response times, and customer satisfaction scores. You can also integrate with Google Analytics for full-funnel tracking.

customSolution.title: Need a Custom Solution?
customSolution.description: If you need a special feature or integration for your e-commerce business, get in touch with us and let's build new solutions together.

cta.title: Ready to boost your e-commerce sales?
cta.description: Join hundreds of online stores using DialogTab to sell more through WhatsApp.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Hospitality & Restaurants | DialogTab
meta.description: Deliver five-star guest communication through WhatsApp Business API. Automate reservations, room service requests, and real-time concierge support for hotels and restaurants.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp hotel communication, WhatsApp Business hospitality, restaurant reservation WhatsApp, concierge WhatsApp, guest messaging platform, hotel chatbot

hero.title: Five-star guest experience with
hero.description: From reservation to checkout, deliver exceptional guest communication at scale. Automate booking confirmations, room service, and concierge support — all via the messaging channels your guests already use.

whyDialogTab.title: Why DialogTab for Hospitality?
whyDialogTab.subtitle: DialogTab is purpose-built for hotels, restaurants, and hospitality businesses that want to deliver five-star guest communication at scale through WhatsApp.

points.title: 24/7 AI Concierge Service
points.description: Your guests get instant answers to every question — Wi-Fi details, restaurant hours, local recommendations, spa bookings — around the clock without staffing a front desk overnight.

points.title: 45% Reduction in No-Shows
points.description: Automated reservation confirmations and smart reminders via WhatsApp dramatically cut no-show rates. Guests can confirm, modify, or cancel with a single tap.

points.title: Seamless Multi-Property Management
points.description: Manage guest communication across all your hotel or restaurant locations from one unified inbox. Standardize service quality while maintaining each property's unique character.

points.title: Instant Guest Feedback Loop
points.description: Capture real-time feedback during stays and address issues before they become negative reviews. Turn satisfied guests into repeat customers and brand advocates.

features.title: Reservation Management
features.description: Accept, confirm, and modify restaurant and hotel reservations through WhatsApp. Send automated reminders to reduce no-shows by up to 45%.

features.title: Digital Concierge Service
features.description: Provide instant answers to guest questions — Wi-Fi passwords, spa hours, local recommendations — 24/7 via AI-powered WhatsApp concierge.

features.title: Room Service & Orders
features.description: Let guests order room service, request amenities, or report issues directly through WhatsApp. Streamline operations with auto-routing to the right department.

features.title: Guest Feedback & Reviews
features.description: Automatically collect feedback during and after stays through conversational WhatsApp surveys. Address issues in real-time before they become negative reviews.

features.title: Multi-Property Management
features.description: Manage guest communication across multiple locations from one unified inbox. Standardize service quality while allowing local customization.

features.title: Upselling & Promotions
features.description: Send personalized offers for room upgrades, spa packages, and dining specials based on guest preferences and booking history.

howItWorks.title: How DialogTab Works for Hospitality
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your hotel or restaurant connected to WhatsApp and start delivering exceptional guest experiences in minutes.

steps.title: Connect Your Property
steps.description: Link your hotel or restaurant's WhatsApp Business number to DialogTab. Connect your PMS, reservation system, or booking platform for seamless data flow.

steps.title: Configure Guest Journeys
steps.description: Set up automated pre-arrival welcome messages, booking confirmations, check-in instructions, room service menus, and post-stay feedback flows.

steps.title: Automate Guest Services
steps.description: Let AI handle common guest inquiries like amenity requests, restaurant hours, and local recommendations. Route complex requests to the right department automatically.

steps.title: Scale Across Properties
steps.description: Replicate your winning communication templates across all locations. Monitor guest satisfaction scores and optimize service quality from a central dashboard.

items.title: Pre-Arrival Communication
items.description: Send welcome messages with check-in details, parking info, and special requests confirmation before guests arrive.

items.title: In-Stay Service Requests
items.description: Let guests request extra towels, room service, or maintenance through WhatsApp — routed automatically to the right staff.

items.title: Restaurant Table Management
items.description: Handle reservation requests, waitlist updates, and menu inquiries through WhatsApp for a seamless dining experience.

items.title: Post-Stay Loyalty Programs
items.description: Engage guests after checkout with personalized offers, loyalty rewards, and exclusive return-visit promotions via WhatsApp.

items.question: Can DialogTab integrate with our property management system (PMS)?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab integrates with popular PMS platforms and reservation systems through API connections. Guest data, booking details, and room information sync automatically so your team always has context for every conversation.

items.question: How does the AI concierge handle guest requests?
items.answer: The AI concierge is trained on your property's specific information — room types, amenities, restaurant menus, local attractions, and policies. It can answer up to 80% of guest questions instantly and seamlessly hands off complex requests to your staff with full conversation context.

items.question: Can we manage multiple hotel or restaurant locations from one account?
items.answer: Absolutely. DialogTab supports multi-property management from a single unified inbox. Each property can have its own WhatsApp number, custom templates, and team assignments while you maintain oversight and quality standards from a central dashboard.

items.question: How does DialogTab help reduce restaurant no-shows?
items.answer: DialogTab sends automated confirmation messages after booking and smart reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before the reservation. Guests can confirm, modify, or cancel with a single tap. Hotels and restaurants typically see a 40-45% reduction in no-shows.

items.question: Is guest data secure on DialogTab?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab uses end-to-end encryption provided by WhatsApp, along with enterprise-grade security for data at rest. We comply with GDPR and data protection regulations. Guest data is stored securely and access is controlled through role-based permissions.

hero.title: Drive automotive sales with
hero.description: From test drive bookings to service appointments, manage every customer interaction through WhatsApp. Automate lead follow-ups, send vehicle specs, and close deals faster with conversational commerce.

whyDialogTab.title: Why DialogTab for Automotive?
whyDialogTab.subtitle: DialogTab is purpose-built for dealerships and automotive businesses that need to convert leads faster, fill service bays, and build lasting customer relationships through WhatsApp.

points.title: 40% More Test Drive Bookings
points.description: Turn website visitors and showroom inquiries into confirmed test drives with instant WhatsApp booking flows. Automated reminders ensure customers actually show up.

points.title: Instant Vehicle Spec Sharing
points.description: Share detailed vehicle specifications, high-resolution photos, pricing breakdowns, and financing options directly in WhatsApp. Customers get answers in seconds, not hours.

points.title: Multi-Dealership Lead Routing
points.description: Automatically route inquiries to the nearest dealership or the most suitable sales agent based on vehicle interest, location, and availability. No lead falls through the cracks.

points.title: Complete After-Sales Lifecycle
points.description: From service reminders to recall notifications to trade-in offers, keep every customer engaged throughout their entire vehicle ownership journey via WhatsApp.

features.title: Test Drive Scheduling
features.description: Let customers book test drives directly through WhatsApp. Send confirmations, reminders, and follow-up messages automatically to maximize show-up rates.

features.title: Vehicle Inquiry Management
features.description: Share vehicle specs, photos, pricing, and availability instantly through WhatsApp. AI answers common questions while agents handle serious buyers.

features.title: Service Appointment Booking
features.description: Automate service scheduling, send maintenance reminders, and provide real-time updates on repair status via WhatsApp.

features.title: Lead Follow-Up Automation
features.description: Never lose a lead. Automatically follow up with prospects who showed interest, send personalized vehicle recommendations based on their preferences.

features.title: Multi-Dealership Management
features.description: Manage customer conversations across multiple dealerships from one inbox. Route inquiries to the nearest location or most suitable sales agent.

features.title: After-Sales Communication
features.description: Keep customers engaged with service reminders, recall notifications, warranty updates, and trade-in opportunities through WhatsApp.

howItWorks.title: How DialogTab Works for Automotive
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your dealership connected to WhatsApp and start converting more leads into buyers and service appointments.

steps.title: Connect Your Dealership
steps.description: Link your dealership's WhatsApp Business number to DialogTab. Connect your DMS or CRM system to sync vehicle inventory, customer data, and service records.

steps.title: Configure Sales & Service Flows
steps.description: Set up automated test drive booking confirmations, vehicle inquiry responses, service appointment reminders, and lead follow-up sequences tailored to your dealership.

steps.title: Automate Lead Engagement
steps.description: Let AI qualify leads by answering vehicle questions, sharing specs and pricing, and booking test drives. Hot leads are instantly routed to your best sales agents.

steps.title: Scale Across Locations
steps.description: Roll out your winning sales and service playbooks across all dealership locations. Track performance by agent, location, and vehicle model from one dashboard.

items.title: New Vehicle Launch Campaigns
items.description: Send targeted WhatsApp campaigns for new model launches with specs, pricing, and instant test drive booking to interested customers.

items.title: Service Reminder Automation
items.description: Automatically notify customers when their vehicle is due for service, oil change, or tire rotation — with one-click appointment booking.

items.title: Trade-In & Upgrade Offers
items.description: Reach existing customers with personalized trade-in valuations and upgrade offers based on their vehicle age and service history.

items.title: Real-Time Repair Updates
items.description: Keep customers informed about their vehicle's repair progress with automated WhatsApp updates at each stage of the service process.

items.question: Can DialogTab integrate with our dealership management system (DMS)?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab integrates with leading DMS and CRM platforms through API connections. Vehicle inventory, customer records, service history, and lead data sync automatically so your sales and service teams always have complete context.

items.question: How does the test drive booking automation work?
items.answer: Customers can request a test drive directly through WhatsApp. DialogTab collects their preferences (model, date, time, location), checks availability, confirms the booking, and sends automatic reminders. After the test drive, it triggers follow-up messages to keep the conversation going.

items.question: Can we manage multiple dealership locations from one platform?
items.answer: Absolutely. DialogTab supports multi-location management with separate WhatsApp numbers per dealership, centralized reporting, and intelligent lead routing to the nearest or most appropriate location based on customer preferences and inventory availability.

items.question: How does DialogTab handle vehicle inventory inquiries?
items.answer: When a customer asks about a specific vehicle, DialogTab can instantly share detailed specs, photos, pricing, financing options, and real-time availability from your synced inventory. AI handles common questions while serious buyer inquiries are routed to sales agents.

items.question: What kind of ROI can automotive businesses expect?
items.answer: Automotive businesses using DialogTab typically see 40% more test drive bookings, 3x faster lead response times, and a 25% increase in service department revenue. The 98% WhatsApp open rate means your messages actually get seen, unlike email or SMS.

hero.title: Simplify insurance with

whyDialogTab.title: Why DialogTab for Insurance?

steps.description: Link your WhatsApp Business number to DialogTab and integrate with your policy management system, CRM, or claims platform through our API for seamless data flow.

items.title: Automated Claims Intake
items.description: Collect claim details, photos, and documentation through guided WhatsApp conversations for faster processing and reduced manual effort.

items.title: Proactive Renewal Campaigns

items.question: Can DialogTab integrate with our existing policy management or claims system?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab integrates with leading insurance platforms and custom systems through robust API connections. Policy data, claims records, and customer information sync in real-time so your agents always have complete policyholder context.

items.question: Is WhatsApp communication secure enough for insurance data?
items.answer: Absolutely. WhatsApp provides end-to-end encryption for all messages. DialogTab adds enterprise-grade security with encrypted data storage, role-based access controls, and full audit trails. We help insurance companies meet regulatory compliance requirements for customer communication.

items.question: How does the automated claims intake process work?
items.answer: When a policyholder initiates a claim via WhatsApp, DialogTab guides them through a conversational flow that collects all required details — incident description, photos, documents, and contact information. The structured data is automatically sent to your claims system, reducing processing time by up to 45%.

items.question: Can we send policy documents and renewal notices through WhatsApp?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab supports sending PDF documents, policy summaries, renewal notices, and coverage comparisons directly through WhatsApp. Messages have a 98% open rate, ensuring your policyholders actually see and engage with important communications.

items.question: How does DialogTab help improve policy renewal rates?
items.answer: DialogTab sends proactive renewal reminders via WhatsApp with personalized coverage summaries, premium comparisons, and one-click renewal links. The conversational approach lets policyholders ask questions and resolve concerns instantly, which typically improves renewal rates by up to 3x compared to traditional channels.

steps.description: Link your WhatsApp Business number to DialogTab and import your dealer contacts, product catalog, and price lists. Integrate with your ERP or inventory system through our API.

items.question: Can DialogTab integrate with our ERP or inventory management system?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab integrates with popular ERP systems, inventory management platforms, and accounting software through API connections. Product catalogs, stock levels, pricing, and order data sync in real-time for accurate dealer communication.

items.question: How do dealers place orders through WhatsApp?
items.answer: Dealers can browse your catalog, check stock availability, and place orders directly within a WhatsApp conversation. DialogTab collects order details, applies tiered pricing, generates order confirmations and invoices, and provides delivery tracking — all automatically.

items.question: Can we send different price lists to different dealer tiers?
items.answer: Absolutely. DialogTab supports dealer segmentation by volume tier, region, or custom categories. You can distribute tier-specific price lists, exclusive promotions, and tailored catalogs to different segments via WhatsApp broadcast.

items.question: How does the payment reminder automation work?
items.answer: DialogTab sends scheduled payment reminders via WhatsApp with invoice details, outstanding amounts, and payment links. You can configure reminder frequency, escalation sequences, and grace periods. Most wholesale businesses see a 30% reduction in overdue payments.

items.question: Can we manage multiple warehouses and distribution centers?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab supports multi-warehouse management from one platform. Orders are automatically routed to the nearest or most appropriate fulfillment location. Dealers can check stock across all warehouses and your team coordinates logistics seamlessly.

steps.description: Link your healthcare facility's WhatsApp Business number to DialogTab. Integrate with your EHR, practice management system, or appointment scheduling platform through our secure API.

items.title: Automated Appointment Reminders
items.description: Send appointment reminders with preparation instructions, location details, and one-click confirmation or rescheduling options.

items.title: Post-Visit Follow-Up
items.description: Automatically check in with patients after visits, share care instructions, and schedule follow-up appointments through WhatsApp.

items.title: Vaccination & Screening Campaigns
items.description: Run targeted health campaigns for vaccinations, annual screenings, and preventive care with personalized WhatsApp outreach.

items.title: Emergency Triage Support
items.description: Provide initial health guidance through AI-powered WhatsApp triage, directing patients to the appropriate level of care quickly.

items.question: Is WhatsApp communication secure enough for patient data?
items.answer: Yes. WhatsApp provides end-to-end encryption for all messages, meaning only the sender and recipient can read them. DialogTab adds enterprise-grade security with encrypted data storage, role-based access controls, and comprehensive audit trails. We help healthcare providers meet data protection and privacy compliance requirements.

items.question: Can DialogTab integrate with our EHR or practice management system?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab integrates with leading EHR platforms and practice management systems through secure API connections. Patient data, appointment schedules, and clinical information sync automatically so your staff always has the context they need.

items.question: How does the automated appointment reminder system work?
items.answer: DialogTab sends customizable reminders at intervals you define — for example, 48 hours and 2 hours before the appointment. Messages include preparation instructions, location details, and buttons for one-tap confirmation, rescheduling, or cancellation. Healthcare providers typically see a 50% reduction in no-shows.

items.question: Can patients receive test results through WhatsApp?
items.answer: Yes, DialogTab supports secure delivery of test results, lab reports, and medical documents through WhatsApp's encrypted messaging. You can configure automated notifications when results are ready and include follow-up appointment booking options directly in the message.

items.question: How does multi-department routing work?
items.answer: When a patient sends a message, DialogTab's AI analyzes the intent and automatically routes it to the appropriate department — general practice, specialist, lab, pharmacy, or billing. Patients never need to navigate phone menus or get transferred. Urgent messages are flagged and escalated immediately.

This automated funnel typically increases enrollment inquiries by 40%.

items.question: Is student data secure on DialogTab?

items.question: Is sending WhatsApp bulk messages legal?
items.answer: Yes, sending bulk messages through the WhatsApp Business API is completely legal and secure. DialogTab, as an official Meta partner, ensures full compliance with WhatsApp policies. You can send bulk messages as long as you have customer consent (opt-in).

items.question: How many messages can I send per day?
items.answer: With the WhatsApp Business API, you can send up to 100,000 messages per day. Message capacity is gradually increased based on your account's quality score and sending history. The DialogTab team supports you throughout this process.

items.question: How does the cart reminder feature work?
items.answer: When customers add products to their cart but do not complete the purchase, the system automatically sends a reminder message via WhatsApp and/or email after a set period. Custom discount codes can be added to messages and sending times can be customized.

items.question: Which e-commerce platforms can I integrate with?
items.answer: DialogTab integrates with Shopify, WooCommerce, Trendyol, Hepsiburada, n11, Amazon and other popular e-commerce platforms. You can connect to any platform with custom API integration.

items.question: How can I track campaign performance?
items.answer: On the DialogTab dashboard, you can track metrics like open rate, click rate, conversion rate and ROI of your campaigns in real time. With the A/B testing feature, you can determine the most effective campaign strategy.
